actuator/bwdStopThrottle.description: command applied to stop emobile when it was moving in backward direction default 1520

actuator/fwdStopThrottle.description: command applied to stop emobile when it was moving in forward direction default 1520

command/distMoy2.description: Upper distance medium for slow speed

command/mode.description: Robot mode, nominal, manuel ou dlvv

light/blue.description: Ymin Ymax Umin Umax Vmin Vmax | DebugMask | DownscaleFactor MinPixCountPercentPerDownscaleArea

light/red.description: Ymin Ymax Umin Umax Vmin Vmax | DebugMask | DownscaleFactor MinPixCountPercentPerDownscaleArea

light/searchareapercent.description: area in percent were light should be searched [xmin xmax ymin ymax]

light/time_window.description: max duration between red and blue light in msec

light/yellow.description: Ymin Ymax Umin Umax Vmin Vmax | DebugMask | DownscaleFactor MinPixCountPercentPerDownscaleArea

light_and_line_detector/debug_img_channe.description: which channels should be published for debug ? yuvcodDL

line/greencolor.description: Ymin Ymax Umin Umax Vmin Vmax | DebugMask | DownscaleFactor MinPixCountPercentPerDownscaleArea

line/redcolor.description: Ymin Ymax Umin Umax Vmin Vmax | DebugMask | DownscaleFactor MinPixCountPercentPerDownscaleArea

line/searchareapercent.description: area in percent were line should be searched [xmin xmax ymin ymax]

line/time_window.description: duration during which we keep info in detection buffer in msec
